message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that I believe holds significant value.  While I can't disclose specifics, I can assure you it's worth at least $1500000 to me.  I'm willing to let you acquire it for a price that allows both of us to benefit.  I'm offering it to you for $2000000.  This is a limited-time offer, so please consider it carefully.  If you decline, I'll be selling it to another buyer for $1500000.
